message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $9500. It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident you won't regret this purchase.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still stuck on $9000. I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
